#Sample Test cases generated by AI Agent for User Login Scenario

Test Case 1: (Positive Case)  
Title: Successful Login with Valid Credentials  
Steps:  
1. Navigate to the login page.  
2. Enter valid User ID and Password.  
3. Click the "Sign in" button.  
Assertions:  
- User is successfully logged in and redirected to the main dashboard page.  
- No error messages are displayed.  

Test Case 2: (Negative Case)  
Title: Login Attempt with Invalid Credentials  
Steps:  
1. Navigate to the login page.  
2. Enter valid User ID and invalid Password.  
3. Click the "Sign in" button.  
Assertions:  
- Login fails.  
- An appropriate error message is displayed (e.g., "Invalid username or password").  

Test Case 3: (Edge Case)  
Title: Login with Empty User ID and Password Fields  
Steps:  
1. Navigate to the login page.  
2. Leave User ID and Password fields empty.  
3. Click the "Sign in" button.  
Assertions:  
- Login is blocked.  
- Validation messages prompt the user to fill in required fields.

Checklist of Potential Bugs:  
- Login accepts invalid or empty credentials without validation.  
- Password field exposes entered characters instead of masking.
- Special characters or SQL injection strings cause errors or security issues.
